page.title: 15TOURISM
page.content: Tourists come to our block in order to visit the {Black Mountain.} From the top of the mountain you can see to the North the historical ruins of Carreg Cennen Castle. To the South you can see (on a clear day) as far as the {Swansea Bay}and out to the{Port Talbot {Steel Works.} All traffic traveling from the South in order to get to the mountain must pass through our block. The main route from the South Coast is the { {A4069}which passes through the Eastern end of our block. Apart from these impressive mountain areas and their views of the surrounding countryside there is little of interest to the tourist around our block.
